content: Investments Stocks General Asked by AnonymousAsked on 17 Jul 2019How different are stock prices in odd lot market vs the normal one?If they are different, what explains the difference, the pros and cons of a odd lot market and a normal market?1 answerAnswerBump0

Elijah Lee, Independent Financial Advisor at Phillip Securities (Jurong East Lite)Top Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 17 Jul 2019Depends on the stock. For blue chips the spread is usually not very big (e.g. 3-4 cents), but for smaller cap companies, it can be significant, as much as 10%.0 comments3
